title: Captain Apache (1971 Western) Lee Van Cleef, Carroll Baker | Take what you can. Kill at will.

sources.description:
They Trailed Him... Tailed Him... Tried to Nail Him... NO WAY!!!
Captain Apache (Lee Van Cleef), a Native American U.S. Cavalry officer, investigates the cryptic last wordsâ€”"April morning"â€”of a murdered Indian commissioner, uncovering a conspiracy to assassinate President Ulysses S. Grant. Through gunfights and deception, Captain Apache races against time to thwart the assassination and prevent a land grab that threatens his people.

Original title: Captain Apache (1971) Alternative title: The Guns of April Morning

Cinematography: John Cabrera
